name: ShellCore Command Remastered
description:
Tactical Retro Combat. End the Core War.

Revisit your childhood in this years-in-the-making free open-source recreation of Flashbacker's ShellCore Command series, reimagined and overhauled for the modern day. As a "newborn" uninfected ShellCore, you will embark on a journey to uncover the secrets of a bizarre - and hostile - world.

Features (beta-0.0.0):

* RTS-style combat where your objective is to build defenses in strategic points to eventually destroy the enemy's bases.

* Two (out of 4) completed episodes of story to play.

* Parts. You can put parts on your ship to make a cooler ship with more parts, and then make an even cooler ship with even more parts. Need I add more?

* 38 unique abilities to use in combat.

* An in-game world editor. The main game world was created using this editor in its entirety!

* If you join the Discord, you can download several community maps, some of which are larger than the main map!

Currently, the game only supports Windows, and testing was primarily done on Windows 10. Full support for Mac and Linux is planned.

GitHub: https://github.com/rudderbucky/shellcore

Discord: https://discord.gg/TXaenta
